title: Le Jockey
marks: Signature and date LRC, backwards, in the plate, in black: [HTL (inte
description: two red-brown horses in full gallop, seen from back PR side; foreground horse ridden by figure in tan pants, white shirt and black hat; horse at L ridden by figure in tan pants, pink shirt and red hat; windmill at R
creditline: Purchase through Art Quest 2003 and The William Hood Dunwoody Fund
